name: Tweakers Dark
additional_info:
Tweakers.net but stripped and alterd to keep as much of the original feel of the tweakers site.
Dark theme will reduce the strain on your eyes while working in darker workplaces.
Ads are not removed to support the site makers, get a membership if you want those gone.

Updates:
v1.01:
- Allows the christmas override from tweakers to show up.
- Overwrite for the text ads to stay dark aswell
v1.02:
-fixed dropdownlist text and backgrounds to be crisper and more readable
v1.03:
-small tweak to preview windows
-forum added to being styled
v1.04:
-update to usereviews
v1.05:
-always fun when a site updates, user reviews on frontpage updated
v1.06: 
resolved quotes
v1.07:
-Fixed issue with video containers
v1.08:
-Fixed tracker tab.
v2.00:
-Major overhaul to make the site look cleaner.
v2.01:
-Fixed Pricewatch tables.
v2.02:
-Minor tweaks: comment highlights.
v2.03:
-Some much needed work done on the forum part of the site.(still WIP)
v2.04:
-fixed background after the site added a background picture for advertizing.
v2.05:
-Some text tweaking on the marketplace part.
v2.06: 
-fixed unreadable tabs in marketplace (Finaly sorry guys :)
v2.07:
-fixed marketplace after site changes
v2.08:
-fixed texts after site changes
------------------------------------------------
known issues:
-still needs more work on the forum part of the site but I don't use it to often to notice the flaws. Will be worked on and updated in the future but won't be rushed.
